data.message: Hello I have a problem with my explore feed. It says the content is not available at the moment. Help!

replies.message: Hi Danijel. If you are still experiencing this issue, please report it to our team: http://bit.ly/2yQe06u. -Anna

Facebook that's the problem. I report it, they say they won't respond individually and I am left in the dark whether the problem is yours or maybe some part of the browser or anything else. :/ I've already sent it there, but nobody said anything. I'm aware you probably have tons of problems, but I sincerely hope something can be done regarding this problem. THank you. ^_^
